title: Mention one advantage of crop rotation.

subtasks: Identify and remove weeds from growing plants
Monitor plant growth and address potential pest or disease issues
Implement cultivation techniques to improve plant health and yield
Continuously monitor and adapt pest and disease management strategies
Identify and treat specific pests or diseases affecting plants
Apply necessary measures to protect plants from evolving pest/disease threats
Respond to student inquiries via WhatsApp for additional support
Address student concerns related to plant cultivation, weeds, pests/diseases, and advancement levels
